  Xpand Rally Xtreme is the one and only game which shows the true climat and 
  conditions of a car rally. Dangerous, technical track, based on the world
  hardest special stages and powerfull cars create an extreme mixture, which 
  demands concentration, self-control and hell of experience from the drivers.
  Let the rivalization carry you away, feel the adrenaline and show who is the
  best driver in the world.
